title: VehicleDescription
description: Represents a full vehicle combination as an array of vehicle parts. The first item describes the towing vehicle. The remaining items describe subsequently attached trailers.

Axle.title: Axle
Axle.description: Represents an axle of a vehicle part.

name.description: The name or identifier of the axle, e.g. 'front_axle'.

position.description: The position of the axle on the vehicle part.

wheels.description: Represents the wheels mounted to the axle.

Geometry.description: Represents the 3D geometry of the vehicle part, e.g. the bounding box of the chassis.
Geometry.title: Geometry

position.description: The position of the anchor point of the geometry on the vehicle part.

Joint.description: Represents the rear joint of the vehicle part.
Joint.title: Joint

position.description: The position of the joint on the vehicle part.

max_angle.description: The maximum allowable angle to which the joint can extend.

Position.description: The reference position of the root coordinate system of the vehicle part. The root coordinate system refers to the primary reference frame used to define the position and orientation of the vehicle part in a three-dimsional space.
Position.title: Position

VehiclePart.title: VehiclePart
VehiclePart.description:
Represents either a vehicle part, which can be either a towing machine or a trailer. 

All positions used for describing the vehicle part and its components refer to a fixed cartesian coordinate system which can be arbitrarily chosen but is subject to following constraints:
  * x - forwards
  * y - left
  * z - up
  
For all nested components, the position of the nested component is defined relative to the position of the parent component. E.g. the position of a wheel is defined relative to the position of the axle, that the wheel is mounted on.

All units are given in meters or degrees.

geometry.description: Represents the 3D geometry of the vehicle part, e.g. the bounding box of the chassis.

ground_clearance.description: The minimum distance between the lowest point of the chassis and the ground.

reference_position.description: The reference position of the root coordinate system of the vehicle part. The root coordinate system refers to the primary reference frame used to define the position and orientation of the vehicle part in a three-dimsional space.

axles.description: Represents the axles of the vehicle part.

front_joint.description: Represents the front joint of the vehicle part.

rear_joint.description: Represents the rear joint of the vehicle part.

position.description: The position of the wheel with regard to the coordinate system of the axle which the wheel is mounted on.

tire.description: The tire is the rubber component that fits around the wheel.
